title: NEDs Reimagined Report Published
description: The IoD Centre for Corporate Governance publishes the NEDs Reimagined report, co-authored by Professor Esser, reassessing the role of non-executive directors more than twenty years after the Higgs Review.

title: Reimagining Non-Executive Directors Event
description: Launch event for the NEDs Reimagined report at the Institute of Directors, London, bringing together directors, governance professionals, and policymakers.

title: Appointed Dean of the Graduate School, Social Sciences
description: Professor Esser appointed Dean of the Graduate School, Social Sciences at the University of Glasgow.
